headline: Risk Assets Rally on Fed Clarity

sections.the_day: Crypto markets posted their strongest single-day gains in weeks, with Bitcoin pushing toward $94k and Ethereum outpacing at +9.3%. The rally mirrored broader risk asset strength across equities and commodities. Volume was consistent with genuine buying rather than short covering, though remained below levels seen during previous breakouts.
sections.the_move_explained: Markets absorbed recent Fed commentary suggesting rate policy has reached terminal hawkishness for this cycle. The dollar weakened correspondingly, removing a key headwind for digital assets. No crypto-specific catalyst—this was pure macro correlation working in the sector's favor.
sections.into_tonight: Asian markets open to positive momentum, though liquidity typically thins into weekend. The psychological $95k level for Bitcoin remains the near-term test.
